# Development Fork for:
## rrtools: Tools for Writing Reproducible Research in R

For the production versionof `rrtoolts` go to: [https://github.com/benmarwick/rrtools](https://github.com/benmarwick/rrtools)

To install this experimental branch:
```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mrecos/rrtools")
```
